title: Extreme Programming
synopsis: Extreme programming, or simply xp, collects complementary practices for developing useful software with a minimum of ceremony.

title: Flow - content types
synopsis: [[Logic Apps - Flow]] flow data through with the content-type it was received with. Internally data is represented as JSON, with the corollary that data may need to be cast before use.

title: How To Wiki
synopsis: Here we describe how to use the web interface to the federated wiki. Read [[About Federated Wiki]] to learn about the project. If you are just starting to write in your first wiki then read the [[Field Guide to the Federation]].

title: JavaScript
synopsis: [[Why JavaScript]]? JavaScript is a wonderful language. It is incredibly flexible, dynamic, and expressive. This page is going to attempt to be a collection of the best resources on core JavaScript stuff from the basics to the bleeding edge, with some material original to this wiki in the middle.
